title.narrative: APPUI AU PLAIDOYER ET A LA COMM EXT

description.narrative: Appui au Plaidoyer et a la Comm Ext, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: La gestion, la coordination et la mise en oeuvre du Programme Pays sont sont correctement assurees

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
